primaryPhoto.description:
The crème de la crème of the entertainment industry is coming together this April to celebrate over 75 years of the NHS and their wonderful life changing and life saving work. A one-night-only celebration, the WITH ALL OUR HEARTS gala comes to the Adelphi Theatre, with 100% of proceeds will be donated directly to NHS Charities Together, the national charity caring for the NHS.
With hosts Oti Mabuse and Dr Ranj, the show features the likes of Joni Ayton-Kent, Kerry Ellis, Tom Francis, Ahmed Hamad, Preeya Kalidas, Rob Madge, Grace McGonigal, NHS Choir, Lewisham & Greenwich, Trevor Dion Nicholas, Jodie Steele and Marisha Wallace, with further casting to be announced.
Co-conceived by Adam Blanshay and Matthew Brind, and choreographed and directed by Dame Arlene Phillips, DBE, this incredible evening will feature new songs written specially to mark the occasion, as well as audience favourite West End hits.
Book your WITH ALL OUR HEARTS theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
